title: Drawing Sonic the Hedgehog: A Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Draw a medium-sized circle.
steps.content: Draw a medium-sized circle. This will be Sonic's head. Sketch lightly at this point.

steps.title: Underneath the head, draw an oval for his torso.
steps.content: Underneath the head, draw an oval for his torso. Now, we can begin adding detail!

steps.title: Start with the top circle.
steps.content: Start with the top circle. Add the spikes that go on top of his head. They are like a saw blade.

steps.title: Draw 2 upside down v's on the head.
steps.content: Draw 2 upside down v's on the head. These will be the character's ears.

steps.title: With the ears, add two bigger v's on top to complete the ears.
steps.content: With the ears, add two bigger v's on top to complete the ears.

steps.title: For the eyes (and part of the muzzle), draw a butterfly shape.
steps.content: For the eyes (and part of the muzzle), draw a butterfly shape.

steps.title: With the butterfly shape, join it to the head.
steps.content: With the butterfly shape, join it to the head. Make sure the butterfly shape is inside the head first!

steps.title: Move onto the body.
steps.content: Move onto the body. Join the head and body by adding a rim outside the oval torso.

steps.title: Draw the arms like you were drawing a couple of bread sticks.
steps.content: Draw the arms like you were drawing a couple of bread sticks. Refer to a Sonic picture for help on this.

steps.title: For the hands, make the gloves look like doughnuts.
steps.content: For the hands, make the gloves look like doughnuts.

steps.title: Now its time for the legs.
steps.content: Now its time for the legs. Draw the legs coming out of the body like sticks.

steps.title: Add detail to the sticks to make them look like his legs.
steps.content: Add detail to the sticks to make them look like his legs.

steps.title: Do the same doughnuts wrapped round his ankles for the socks.
steps.content: Do the same doughnuts wrapped round his ankles for the socks.

steps.title: Draw some triangles for shoes.
steps.content: Draw some triangles for shoes.

steps.title: Add detail to the shoes.
steps.content: Add detail to the shoes. For example, buckles, stripes, etc.

steps.title: Add detail to rest of the drawing.
steps.content: Add detail to rest of the drawing.

steps.title: Erase extra lines.
steps.content: Erase extra lines.

steps.title: Go over lines using a black felt tip marker.
steps.content: Go over lines using a black felt tip marker.

steps.title: Add color!
steps.content: Add color!

steps.title: Draw a circle.
steps.content: Draw a circle. Then add a spiky shape. This will serve as the outline of Sonic's head. Add vertical and horizontal lines. These will help you later when you draw his face.

steps.title: Merge the circle and the spiky shape together.
steps.content: Merge the circle and the spiky shape together. Using the guidelines from the previous step, add his eyes, right ear, nose and mouth.

steps.title: Draw the shape of his body.
steps.content: Draw the shape of his body.

steps.title: Outline his hands and shoes.
steps.content: Outline his hands and shoes. Make them slightly larger than usual. Have his right hand making a thumbs-up sign.

steps.title: Add details.
steps.content: Add details. For example, add lines for the folds of his gloves and add detail to Sonic's shoes.

steps.title: Continue adding details.
steps.content: Continue adding details. For example, draw his tail and the spikes on his back.

steps.title: Sketch circles behind Sonic to serve as a background.
steps.content: Sketch circles behind Sonic to serve as a background. Start outlining Sonic by using a pen or marker and erasing pencil marks.

steps.title: Outline the background circles.
steps.content: Outline the background circles.

steps.title: Color your artwork.
steps.content: Color your artwork. Sonic is usually blue, has green eyes and wears red shoes.
